src:
Hasil Lengkap Liga Inggris Pekan Ke-11: Liverpool Kokoh, Man United Tumbang
04 Nov 2019, 15:48 by Anggi Tiar


Hasil Lengkap Liga Inggris Pekan Ke-11: Liverpool Kokoh, Man United Tumbang

KBRN, Jakarta : Pekan ke-11 Premier League atau Liga Inggris 2019-2020 telah selesai dilangsungkan. Liverpool berhasil meraih kemenangan dan Manchester United harus tumbang saat bertandang ke markas Beurnemouth. Liverpool berhasil meraih poin penuh kala bertandang ke markas Aston Villa. Bermain di Villa Park Stadium, Brimingham, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB, Liverpool sukses mempermalukan tuan rumah denga skor tipis 2-1. Dengan kemenangan itu, The Reds -julukan Liverpool- masih kokoh di puncak klasemen Premier League 2019-2020 dengan mengoleksi 31 poin dari 11 pertandingan. Di bawah mereka, Manchester City tetap bernapas menjaga persaingan setelah melakoni comeback kontra Southampton. Ya, seperti hal-nya Liverpool, City juga meraih kemenangan dengan skor 2-1 saat menjamu Southampton. Sayang bagi Manchester United yang gagal meraih kemenangan di pekan ini. Ya, tim berjuluk Setan Merah itu menelan kekalahan saat bertandang ke markas Bournemouth dengan skor tipis 0-1. Gol tunggal yang membuat Man United terbenam dicetak oleh Joshua King. Kini, Man United berada di peringkat 10 klasemen sementara dengan koleksi 16 poin dari 11 laga. Berikut Hasil Lengkap Liga Inggris Pekan ke-11: Sabtu (02/11/19)Bournemouth 1 - 0 Manchester UnitedArsenal 1 - 1 WolverhamptonAston Villa 1 - 2 LiverpoolBrighton & Hove 2 - 0 Norwich CityManchester City 2 - 1 SouthamptonSheffield 3 - 0 BurnleyWest Ham 2 - 3 NewcastleMinggu (03/11/19)Watford 1 - 2 ChelseaCrystal Palace 0 - 2 Leicester CityEverton 1 - 1 Tottenham
text:
Premier League Complete Results Week 11: Liverpool Sturdy, Man United Fall
Nov 04 2019, 15:48 by Anggi Tiar


Premier League Complete Results Week 11: Liverpool Sturdy, Man United Fall

KBRN, Jakarta: Week 11 of the Premier League or English Premier League 2019-2020 has been completed. Liverpool won and Manchester United had to fall when they visited the headquarters of Beurnemouth. Liverpool won full points when they travel to Aston Villa headquarters. Playing at Villa Park Stadium, Brimingham, Saturday (11/02/2019) night WIB, Liverpool successfully embarrassed the host with a thin score of 2-1. With that victory, the Reds, nicknamed Liverpool, still firmly at the top of the 2019-2020 Premier League standings by collecting 31 points from 11 matches. Under them, Manchester City is still breathing to maintain competition after diving comeback counter Southampton. Yes, like Liverpool, City also won with a score of 2-1 at home to Southampton. Unfortunately for Manchester United who failed to win this week. Yes, the team nicknamed the Red Devils defeat when they travel to the headquarters of Bournemouth with a thin score 0-1. The single goal that made Man United sink was scored by Joshua King. Now, Man United is ranked 10th in the standings with a collection of 16 points from 11 matches. Here are the complete results of the Premier League Week 11: Saturday (02/11/19) Bournemouth 1 - 0 Manchester United 1 - 1 Wolverhamptonston Villa 1 - 2 Liverpool Brighton & Hove 2 - 0 Norwich City Manchester City 2 - 1 Southampton Southampton Sheffield 3 - 0 Burnley West Ham 2 - 3 Newcastle Week (11/03/19) Watford 1 - 2 Chelsea Crystal Palace 0 - 2 Leicester City Eastton 1 - 1 Tottenham
